nodes.text: Poe Dameron 24 is the twenty-fourth issue of the comic book series Star Wars: Poe Dameron. The comic was written by Charles Soule, illustrated by Angel Unzueta, and published by Marvel Comics on February 14, 2018.
Lor San Tekka has been captured…again! And it's up to Black Squadron to save him. Meanwhile, Terex has his own plans in motion…to finally free himself from the grasp of the First Order!
